definition: burrowing edible land tortoise of southeastern North America
details:
noun
- burrowing edible land tortoise of southeastern North America
= synonyms: gopher tortoise
- burrowing rodent of the family Geomyidae having large external cheek pouches
= synonyms: pouched rat
- any of various terrestrial burrowing rodents of Old and New Worlds
= synonyms: ground squirrel, spermophile
- a zealously energetic person (especially a salesman)
= synonyms: goffer
